reviewText: Loved it !!  Have watched it several times while singing at the top of my lungs !!  If you're a Bon Jovi fan, this is one for your collection !!
There was no music just documentary. Vey disappointed
This is a good and entertaining film about BJs later period from 2000 onwards. Features some very strong archive and great interviews. Very much recommended to fans of this incredible band

This is just a dvd that tells the story of the albums. Who was the producer. The members of the band speak very little.
Do not waste your money on this thing.
Huge fan of Bon Jovi and i enjoy all things BJ and this was no exception. Very good indeed !
